stories.original_headline: Super Bowl LX ads: all AI everything
stories.original_summary: Super Bowl LX is nearly here, with the Seattle Seahawks taking on the New England Patriots. While Bad Bunny will be the star of the halftime show, AI could be the star of the commercial breaks, much like crypto was a few years ago. Last year’s Super Bowl featured a Google Gemini ad that fumbled […]
stories.fantasy_headline: Royal Games Feature New Automaton Magic for Guild Messages
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Tournament of the Sixtieth Season approaches! While the Bard Badicus Bunny will enchant the crowd, powerful new Construct Magic is set to dominate the enchanted announcements during breaks. Guilds will use these mystical displays, much like the arcane gold-coin spells of seasons past, to sway public favor.

stories.original_headline: Japanese people brave snow to vote in snap election
stories.original_summary: A coalition led by Takaichi is expected to clinch a decisive win, according to polls.
stories.fantasy_headline: Eastern Islanders Brave Blizzard for Sudden Royal Council Convocation
stories.fantasy_story: Despite a harsh blizzard, the diligent folk of the Eastern Isles ventured forth to cast their votes in a sudden convocation for the Royal Council. Whispers from the village seers and market scribes suggest the Takaichi Coalition is destined for a grand victory, promising new leadership for the lands.
